sentences.sContent: The term customarily takes in both the fuel and the oxidizer .
sentences.sContent_eng: The term customarily takes in both the fuel and the oxidizer .
sentences.sCn: 这一术语习惯上即包括燃料，又包括氧化剂。

sentences.sContent: Reacts with oxidizer, may foam explosion with the flame, high heat.
sentences.sContent_eng: Reacts with oxidizer, may foam explosion with the flame, high heat.
sentences.sCn: 与氧化剂会发生反应，遇明火、高热易引起燃烧；

sentences.sContent: In this case it is desirable to incorporate additional oxidizer into the composition.
sentences.sContent_eng: In this case it is desirable to incorporate additional oxidizer into the composition.
sentences.sCn: 在这种情况下，需要把附加的氧化剂加入配方中。

trans.tranOther: an oxidant, esp a substance that combines with the fuel in a rocket engine
